00009 #if !defined(Apoxi_PagingMap_hpp)
00010 #define Apoxi_PagingMap_hpp
00011 
00012 #include <Kernel/Types.hpp>
00013 
00014 // Defines the mapping of a key code to it's character code presentations.
00015 struct PagingMapEntry {
00016     UINT8 GetKeyCode() const { return keycode; }
00017     WCHAR GetNumber() const { return number; }
00018     const WCHAR* GetUpperCaseChar() const { return uppercase; }
00019     const WCHAR* GetLowerCaseChar() const { return lowercase; }
00020     BOOLEAN IsValid() const { return number != 0; }
00021     BOOLEAN IsSwitch() const { return (number != 0) && (uppercase == 0) && (lowercase == 0); }
00022 
00023     UINT8 keycode;                      // the code of the key this mapping applies to
00024     WCHAR number;                       // numeric presentation
00025     const WCHAR* uppercase;             // upper case presentations
00026     const WCHAR* lowercase;             // lower case presentations
00027 };
00028 
00029 // Defines the key to character mapping for a certain language.
00030 struct PagingMap {
00031     const PagingMapEntry& GetPagingMapEntry(KeyCode key_code) const {
00032         INT i = 0;
00033         while ((m_pme[i].GetNumber() != 0) && (m_pme[i].GetKeyCode() != key_code))
00034             i++;
00035         return m_pme[i];
00036     }
00037 
00038     WCHAR GetNumber(KeyCode key_code) const {
00039         return GetPagingMapEntry(key_code).GetNumber();
00040     }
00041 
00042     const WCHAR* GetLowerCaseChar(KeyCode key_code) const {
00043         return GetPagingMapEntry(key_code).GetLowerCaseChar();
00044     }
00045 
00046     //LanguageId lang_id;               // language the mapping applies to
00047     const PagingMapEntry* m_pme;        // Array of mapping entries. Last entry must be initialized with zero.
00048 };
00049 
00050 #endif  // Apoxi_PagingMap_hpp
